short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See something interesting? Now share it with your followers at lightning fast speed with the new RFS extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See something interesting? Now share it with your followers at lightning fast speed with the new RFS extension.

This extension supports ReadyForSocial. Using this user can scrap the data of the article page they are viewing and create there own post from the scrapped content.

To use it user needs to first login to the ReadyForSocial account and then on the article page, click on the 'Get Data' button of the extension and then hit 'Submit' button in order to generate the post.
